        ArrayList for storing error messages for client-side output

      • tool

        private final CRUDValidationTool tool
        The CRUDValidationTool associated with this Validator instance. It performs all validations for each input in the request

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> statusList
        ArrayList for storing status messages (for client-side use)

        Parameters:
        messageList - used to store error messages for json output
        userMessageList - used to store error messages for client-side output

    • Method Detail

      • isUpdateBidValid

        public boolean isUpdateBidValid(java.lang.String userId,
                       java.lang.String amountStr,
                       java.lang.String code,
                       java.lang.String section)
        SERVER SIDE VALIDATION: to be used with EditBidServlet, and AddBidServlet
        Parameters:
        userId - user id of the user
        amountStr - amount of the bid
        code - course code of the course being bidded
        section - section code of the course being bidded
        Returns:
        true if the incoming request is valid and can be processed

      • isUserAddBidValid

        public boolean isUserAddBidValid(java.lang.String userId,
                        java.lang.String amountStr,
                        java.lang.String code,
                        java.lang.String section)
        Returns true if the client-side incoming bid request is valid
        Parameters:
        userId - user id of the user
        amountStr - amount of the bid
        code - course code of the bid
        section - section code of the bid
        Returns:
        true if the client-side incoming bid request is valid

      • isDeleteBidValid

        public boolean isDeleteBidValid(java.lang.String userid,
                       java.lang.String course,
                       java.lang.String section)
        SERVER SIDE VALIDATION: to be used with DropBidServlet
        Parameters:
        userid - user id of the user
        course - course code of the course being bidded
        section - section code of the course being bidded
        Returns:
        true if the incoming request is valid and can be deleted

      • isDropSectionValid

        public boolean isDropSectionValid(java.lang.String userid,
                         java.lang.String course,
                         java.lang.String section)
        SERVER SIDE VALIDATION: to be used with DropSectionServlet
        Parameters:
        userid - userId of the student
        course - course code of the course being bidded
        section - section code of the course being bidded
        Returns:
        true if the incoming request is valid and enrolled course can be dropped

      • getReasonIfNotBiddable

        public java.lang.String getReasonIfNotBiddable(Student studentObj,
                                      Section sectionObj)
        The method is used by bid-session.jsp to find out the reason why the Section of the particular course is NOT biddable by the student. If null is returned, there is no reason, in other words, the Student CAN bid for the section / section is biddable by the student.
        Parameters:
        studentObj - the student object
        sectionObj - the section object being bidded
        Returns:
        - the reason for why the section cannot be bidded by the student - null if the section IS BIDDABLE

      • getReasonIfNotBiddableCourse

        public java.lang.String getReasonIfNotBiddableCourse(Student studentObj,
                                            Course courseObj)
        The method is used by bid.jsp to find out the reason why the particular course is NOT biddable by the student. If null is returned, there is no reason, in other words, the Student CAN bid for the section / section is biddable by the student.
        Parameters:
        studentObj - student object representing the user
        courseObj - course object of the course being bidded
        Returns:
        - the reason for why the section cannot be bidded by the student - null if the section IS BIDDABLE
